title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Plain weave foundation. Mordant for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 56 x 27 cm (22 1/16 x 10 5/8 in.)
description: Straight and wavy ribbon stripes with flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: Plain weave foundation. Mordant for black, 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-28.
